sentences: Kurjus on inimliku olemuse 체ks ilminguid.
See teo tagaj채rjed olid t채ielikult kurjad.
context: Kurjus is an Estonian noun that refers to evil, wickedness, or malicious intent. It describes the quality of being morally bad or harmful. The word can refer to abstract concepts of evil as well as specific acts of wickedness or vicious behavior.
